What happened Steve?

Well, I went on holiday in the mountains.
First, I wanted to go for a walk but it wasn´t

fun.
Walk, walk, walk, walk. Hey! Hello! Look,

it´s cold but it´s sunny. A good day for

Oh well, I wanted to skate. But that was a
bad idea.
